meanings.sent1: The bacon was zizzling in the pan.
meanings.sent2: I love it when the sausages start zizzling on the barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The eggs joined the zizzling bacon party in the skillet.
meanings.sent4: The campfire crackled and zizzled as the flames danced.
meanings.sent5: The hot oil zizzled as the chef dropped the vegetables in.

meanings.definition: To cook with a sizzling noise.
meanings.sent1: She zizzled the steak to perfection on the grill.
meanings.sent2: The chef zizzled the shrimp in the hot wok.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen was filled with the delightful aroma of zizzling food.
meanings.sent4: The sizzling pan zizzled as the stir-fry was prepared.
meanings.sent5: The barbecue was zizzling with delicious meats and veggies.

meanings.definition: To move with a sizzling sound.
meanings.sent1: The snake zizzled through the grass, startling us.
meanings.sent2: The hot air balloons zizzled gracefully across the sky.
meanings.sent3: The skateboard zizzled down the ramp with speed.
meanings.sent4: The leaves zizzled as the wind rustled through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The rocket zizzled as it launched into space.
